groups.name: zonky.test.database
groups.description: Configuration properties for Zonky Embedded Database library.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure prefetching of prepared databases.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure embedded PostgreSQL database.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for PostgreSQL database running in a Docker container. Only available if database provider is set to Docker.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.zonky-provider
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for Zonky Embedded Postgres. Only available if database provider is set to Zonky.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.yandex-provider
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for Yandex's Embedded PostgreSQL Server. Only available if database provider is set to Yandex.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.provider
properties.description: Provider used to create the underlying embedded database, see the documentation for the comparision matrix.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Prefix to use for the names of database prefetching threads.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.concurrency
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrently running database prefetching threads.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.pipeline-cache-size
properties.description: Maximum number of prepared databases per pipeline. Where pipeline is a queue of independent databases that contains the same initial data.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.client.properties
properties.description: Additional properties used to configure the test data source.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.initdb.properties
properties.description: Additional properties to pass to initdb command during the database initialization.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.server.properties
properties.description: Additional properties used to configure the embedded PostgreSQL server.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker.tmpfs.enabled
properties.description: Whether to mount postgres data directory as tmpfs.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker.tmpfs.options
properties.description: Mount options used to configure the tmpfs filesystem.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.zonky-provider.preparer-isolation
properties.description: Whether there should be one shared database cluster or multiple independent database clusters.

values.description: Run the embedded database in a Docker container.
Use Zonky's fork of OpenTable Embedded PostgreSQL Component to create the embedded database (https://github.com/zonkyio/embedded-postgres).
Use OpenTable Embedded PostgreSQL Component to create the embedded database (https://github.com/opentable/otj-pg-embedded).
Use Yandex's Embedded PostgreSQL Server to create the embedded database (https://github.com/yandex-qatools/postgresql-embedded).
